translations.account_delete_confirm_popover_text:
All personal data linked to this email address will be deleted within 30 days.
What you think matters to us! If you have a minute, we would love to {supportLinkStart}hear your opinion{supportLinkEnd} on how we can improve trivago.
And for your future travels, we're always here to help.
translations.account_delete_confirm_popover_title:
Request received.
Your account will be deleted.
translations.account_delete_popover_explanation:
After your account is deleted, trivago will no longer have access to any personal data or previous correspondence made through this account. It may take up to 30 days to complete this process.
To know more about how trivago uses your information, please take a moment to review our {policyLinkStart}Privacy Policy{policyLinkEnd}.
translations.additional_fees_taxes: Additional local fees and taxes might be applied later.
translations.alt_hotel_suggestions: If you like this stay, you might also be interested in
translations.alternative_result_list_header: These stays match some of your criteria.
translations.app_landing_header: With the trivago app, the ideal hotel is in your hands.
translations.app_landing_intro: The trivago app instantly compares  millions of  hotels worldwide, from hundreds of booking sites. All you have to do is search by city, address or point of interest, to find your ideal hotel at a great price.
translations.app_landing_step1: With one tap you can gain instant access to millions of hotels, making trivago the only app you’ll ever need for your next booking.
translations.app_landing_step2: Explore locations using the trivago map, or search by current location to find the closest hotels to you. Ideal for a last-minute booking on the go.
translations.app_landing_step3: Read hotel reviews collected from multiple booking sites, so you can learn from the experience of other guests.

translations.bee_favorites_my_favorites_page_emtpy_st: Click the heart icon next to a stay’s name and it will be saved here.
translations.bee_favorites_my_favorites_page_login_pr: {linkStart}Log in{linkEnd}, and we will save your favorites to your trivago account.
Tie your favorites to your account
translations.bee_mobile_web_banner_download_app_body_: Easily compare hotel prices for savings on the go.
translations.calendar_enter_dates_CTA_subheadline: See prices and availability for your dates
translations.cleanliness_247_doctor_description: There is a doctor on site whom guests and staff have reliable access to
translations.cleanliness_63_room_service_description: Food from the on-site dining facility can be delivered to guests’ rooms
translations.cleanliness_826_cleaning_description: Rooms (or the entire property) are regularly disinfected
translations.cleanliness_828_sanitizer_description: Both common areas and guests' rooms are supplied with hand sanitizer
translations.cleanliness_830_temperature_description: Safety protocol at this property includes checking the temperature of guests and staff
translations.cleanliness_832_masks_description: Disposable masks are provided within guest rooms or common areas
translations.cleanliness_834_distancing_description: Measures are in place to help guests and staff maintain a safe distance
translations.cleanliness_836_procedure_description: The staff are trained on what protocol to follow if there is a report of an infection
translations.cleanliness_838_booking_buffer_descripti: Bookings are spaced at least 24 hours apart. Cleaning is the only activity permitted in this buffer period.
translations.cleanliness_840_online_description: Check in/check out can be done online
translations.cleanliness_846_safety_description: Protocols are in place to reduce risk of infection as required by an external authority
translations.cleanliness_848_cashless_description: Guests can use cashless payment methods
translations.clp_meta_description_cheap: Find Incredible Cheap Hotels in {Path__sName}, {Path__sCountryName}. Search and Compare the Prices of {Path__iCountHotel} Accommodation Deals to Find Very Low Rates with {Global__sDomain}
translations.date_nav_legal: Based on average prices on trivago from the last 30 days
translations.dealfinder_ranking_UK_badge_tooltip: This default ranking takes into account the probable interest for the user, the rate offered and the compensation paid by the advertisers. The offers are not exhaustive.
translations.delete_account_error_legal: Learn more about how trivago uses your information by reviewing our {legalLinkStart}Privacy Policy{legalLinkEnd}.
translations.delete_account_error_message: We were unable to delete your trivago account. Please check your account for any pending or unresolved payments and try again, or get in touch with our help center.
translations.do_not_sell_my_personal_information: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
translations.enable_location: To search using your current location, enable location access for trivago in your browser settings.
translations.end_of_calendar_subheadline: Our calendar will update as more dates become available. Try searching again closer to your travel dates.
translations.err_6: That's not a valid email address. Please try again.
translations.error_try_again_later: An error occurred. Please try again a bit later.
translations.footer_legal_disclaimer1: Due to technical limitations, we cannot always guarantee real-time rates from our booking partners.
translations.footer_legal_disclaimer2: For this reason, the rate displayed on the booking site may no longer match the rate on displayed on trivago. We do not assume any liability for the correctness of the given information, especially of the rates and availability.
translations.footer_link_mobile_app: Mobile apps - searching on the go
translations.guest_selector_child_age_notification: Why is this required? Because we don't want you to overpay or miss out on deals for children of a certain age.
translations.guest_selector_hotelplanner_link: Big group? Try Hotelplanner.com for 6+ rooms
translations.help_support_article_booking_confirm_con: In some cases, it may take up to 72 hours for the booking site to send the booking confirmation. Has it been longer since you've booked? Is your trip coming up soon? It's always best to speak to the booking site directly.
translations.help_support_article_cancel_booking_cont: To cancel or change your booking, it's always best to speak to the booking site directly. Since the booking site is responsible for your reservation, they would be able to help you! Most contact information can be found at the bottom of your booking confirmation. Alternatively, booking sites will have a contact page, where you will likely find all contact details including direct phone numbers to the booking site's support center.
translations.help_support_article_cancel_booking_rela: Cancelling due to an error on trivago?
translations.help_support_article_info_box_trivago: Remember! trivago is a price comparison website, bookings are not made directly with us. To find out more, click {explainLinkStart}here{explainLinkEnd}.
translations.help_support_article_payment_issue_conte:
Something went wrong? Need your money back? Need an invoice or a receipt for your records?
We recommend contacting the booking site used to secure the reservation.
If you would like to contact the booking site, most contact information can be found at the bottom of your booking confirmation. Alternatively, booking sites will have a contact page, where you will find all contact details including direct phone numbers to the booking site's support center.
translations.help_support_article_payment_issue_relat: How do I get in contact with the booking site or hotel?
What about taxes & other fees that I might have to pay?
translations.help_support_form_attachment_too_large: This file is larger than 20 MB.
translations.help_support_form_booking_site_link: Can't remember who you booked with?
translations.help_support_form_booking_site_placehold: Enter the name of the booking site
translations.help_support_form_error_submit: Something went wrong and your message could not be sent. Please {helpCentreStart}try again on our help center{helpCentreEnd}.
translations.help_support_form_send_information: We will get back to you within 1 business day on: {userMail}
translations.help_support_info_box_content: You can write us about other topics on our {contactFormLinkStart}full contact form{contactFormLinkEnd} or you can read more information about trivago on our {helpCenterLinkStart}help center{helpCenterLinkEnd}.
translations.help_support_info_box_title: Still haven't found what you were looking for?
translations.help_support_message_send_content: We will try our best to get back to you through mail ({userMail}) within 1 business day.
translations.help_support_selector_option_booking_con: I haven't received my booking confirmation
translations.help_support_selector_option_cancel_book: I want to cancel/modify my booking

translations.help_support_selector_option_payment_iss: I have a question about a payment issue
translations.help_support_selector_title: What can we help you with?
translations.help_support_teaser_non_member: To be able to quickly ask us a question you have to {loginStart}log in{loginEnd} or {signUpStart}create an account{signUpEnd} if you don't have one yet. No matter what, you can still try sending us your inquiry on our {helpCentreStart}help center{helpCentreEnd}.
translations.help_support_trv_error_form_options_titl: What kind of error did you encounter? (Required)
translations.image_legal_disclaimer: The images displayed on trivago are provided by and proprietary to third parties.
translations.info_item_unavailable: We couldn’t find deals available for the room and dates you want ({arrivalDate} - {departureDate})
translations.info_no_destination_selected: Where would you like to stay? Search using a hotel name, city, region, famous landmark, or country.
translations.legal_disclaimer_au: In order to supply this free comparison, booking sites pay us a fee when a user clicks on their specific offer. We do not display any offers (including cheaper offers) that do not meet our minimum fee requirements. Cheaper offers may on occasion be available under "More deals" as we request updated offers from online booking sites when you click that button.
translations.location_unavailable_core: We’re sorry, but we were unable to retrieve your location. Please retry or type in a destination.
translations.login_invalid_email: Looks like you entered an invalid address. Check it and try again

translations.seo_oar_faq_answer_checkin_checkout_time: Check-in at {hotelName} is available from: <time dateTime="{checkInHour}:00">{checkInHour}:00</time>. Check-out time is by <time dateTime="{checkOutHour}:00">{checkOutHour}:00</time>.
translations.seo_oar_faq_answer_hotel_cancellation_po: The cancellation policy for {hotelName} varies depending on the type of room and booking conditions.
translations.seo_oar_faq_answer_pets_in_hotel_yes: Yes, {hotelName} has a pet policy that may vary based on the room type or availability. Please check with the hotel directly to learn about their pet policy.
translations.seo_oar_faq_answer_pools_in_hotel_yes: Yes, {hotelName} offers {poolCount} {poolCount, select, 1 {pool area} other {pool areas}}.

translations.seo_odr_faq_answer_best_family_hotels_in: If you're visiting {destinationName} with your family, you could look at {hotelsList}. These hotels offer a variety of family-friendly services and activities.
translations.seo_odr_faq_answer_best_hotels_in_destin: In {destinationName}, you might want to check out {hotelsList}. These hotels come highly recommended by many travelers.
translations.seo_odr_faq_answer_best_luxury_hotels_in: For a taste of luxury in {destinationName}, you might want to explore {hotelsList}. These hotels are known for their superior amenities and high-class services.
translations.seo_odr_faq_answer_best_petfriendly_hote: Traveling with pets? The hotels {hotelsList} could be ideal. These hotels are not only pet-friendly but also offer numerous amenities to make your pets feel at home.
translations.seo_odr_faq_answer_best_pool_hotels_in_d: If you’re looking for a hotel with a pool in {destinationName}, check out {hotelsList} – all of which offer great pool facilities for guests to enjoy.
translations.seo_odr_faq_answer_best_spa_hotels_in_de: If you’re looking for a relaxing spa experience during your stay in {destinationName}, check out {hotelsList} – all of which offer great spa services and facilities.

translations.stays_bargain_deal_tooltip_disclaimer: Stays are grouped based on their similarity such as rating, location, attributes, facilities, stars or accommodation type. Great finds are deals which are much cheaper than the lowest price of similar stays. The conditions and/or room types for this deal might differ from others. Check the booking site for details.
translations.stays_budget_modal_total_stay_tooltip: Select more than 1 night to set a price range for the total stay.
translations.stays_champion_area_discount_price_discl: Our partner site provides the discount and original price based on your search. Check their site for more details.
translations.stays_checkout_page_additional_local_tax: *Additional local taxes and fees may apply at the property.
translations.stays_checkout_page_booking_loading_disc: Please do not refresh or close the tab while we are confirming your booking.
translations.stays_checkout_page_booking_loading_minu: This might take a few minutes...
translations.stays_checkout_page_confirmation_message: Customer support for this booking is provided by {hotelname}. To modify or cancel your booking, please reach out to {hotelname}:
{hotelname} will send you a confirmation of your booking details to {emailaddress} soon. Please give the hotel up to 30 minutes to process your booking.
For any questions regarding your booking, please reach out to {hotelname} directly. Booking reference: {bookingReference}
translations.stays_checkout_page_error_after_complete: If you don’t receive an email, check your bank account to see if your payment was successful.
Please check if you receive an email from the hotel within the next 30 minutes.
If your bank account was charged, but you didn’t receive a confirmation email, please contact {hotelname} customer support.
We're sorry, but we cannot confirm your booking with {hotelname} at this time.
Follow the below steps to resolve the issue
translations.stays_checkout_page_free_cancellation: You will get a full refund if you cancel your booking before your check-in date.
translations.stays_checkout_page_free_cancellation_de: You will get a full refund if you cancel before {cancellation_deadline} (hotel’s local time).
translations.stays_checkout_page_guest_info_booking_c: The booking confirmation will be sent to the email address above. Please make sure it’s correct.
translations.stays_checkout_page_important_info_suppo: Customer support for this booking is provided by {advertiserName}.
translations.stays_checkout_page_important_info_TC_PP: By clicking "Complete booking", you agree to trivago's Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy and {hotelname} Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.

translations.stays_checkout_page_legal_disclaimer_for: Your card issuer may charge a foreign transaction fee.
translations.stays_checkout_page_legal_disclaimer_pri: This price is converted to show you the price in {locale_currency}. You’ll pay in {hotel_currency}. The exchange rate might change before you pay.
translations.stays_checkout_page_non_refundable: This payment is non-refundable. You will not get a refund if you cancel or change your booking.

Please check your payment details and try again.

translations.stays_checkout_page_price_changed_messag: The total price for this stay has increased from {original_price} to {new_price}.
translations.stays_checkout_page_price_drop_message: You’re saving {price_difference}! The total price has dropped from {original_price} to {new_price}.
translations.stays_checkout_page_room_sold_out_messag: Sorry, this room is no longer available for your selected dates.
translations.stays_checkout_page_technical_error_seco: Sorry, we still cannot reach the hotel. Please try again later or explore other stays on trivago.
translations.stays_checkout_page_technical_error_subh: Sorry, we cannot reach the hotel at this time. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translations.stays_comparison_matrix_interacteditem_t: Compare this property with similar options
translations.stays_customisation_survey_booking_answe: I have my preferred booking site, but would book somewhere else if there is a better deal
I prefer to book with the hotel directly
I just book where I can get the lowest price
I have my preferred booking site and hardly ever book somewhere else
translations.stays_customisation_survey_booking_quest: Finally, when it comes to booking a hotel, where do you prefer to book?
translations.stays_customisation_survey_cleanliness_a: I’m a perfectionist and expect the room to be spotless
I want a clean room, but I’m not a perfectionist
translations.stays_customisation_survey_cleanliness_q: How important is cleanliness to you?
translations.stays_customisation_survey_description: Answer five simple questions about your hotel preferences and help us customize your next hotel search experience.
translations.stays_customisation_survey_headline: What matters to you when booking a hotel?
translations.stays_customisation_survey_neighborhood_: Close to main transport (airport, train station etc.)
Which type of neighborhood do you prefer when booking a hotel?
translations.stays_customisation_survey_remote_work_a: No, I just need good enough WiFi to check messages and social media
Yes, I typically need a hotel with a convenient desk and excellent WiFi
translations.stays_customisation_survey_remote_work_q: Do you work remotely when you travel?
translations.stays_customisation_survey_style_answer_: Just a place to sleep will do
Hotels with a refined and elegant design
Hotels with a rich heritage or historical significance
Hotels that reflect the local culture and traditions
Hotels with grand designs and luxurious amenities
Hotels with a simple and functional design
Hotels with specific themes or concepts
Hotels with an architectural style of a certain period
Hotels with a vibrant and modern design
translations.stays_customisation_survey_style_questio: What is your preferred style of hotel?
translations.stays_dealfinder_less_than_usual_tooltip: This property is {value}% cheaper than our forecasted price, which is based on the median price of the property clicked on by trivago users in the past six months, adjusted for seasonal effects.
translations.stays_favorites_list_check_prices_headli: Check prices and availability for your selected dates
translations.stays_favorites_list_select_dates_headli: Select dates to see prices and availability
translations.stays_favorites_page_delete_list_message: Deleting this list will also delete all the stays you have saved to this list.
translations.stays_favorites_page_empty_state_body_co: {highlightStart}Compare{highlightEnd} your favorites to choose the perfect stay
translations.stays_favorites_page_empty_state_body_lo: Log in to save your favorites for later and {highlightStart}create your own lists{highlightEnd}
translations.stays_favorites_page_empty_state_body_na: {highlightStart}Narrow down{highlightEnd} your search by saving your favorite stays here
translations.stays_favorites_page_empty_state_subhead: Save, sort and compare your favorite stays
translations.stays_favorites_page_not_logged_in_headl: Keep track of stays you like
translations.stays_favorites_page_not_logged_in_subhe: {linkStart}Log in or create an account{linkEnd} to save your favorite stays to your account and create your own lists.
translations.stays_filters_all_inclusive_explanation: All meals + some drinks and snacks included
translations.stays_footer_legal_disclaimer: The prices and availability we receive from booking sites change constantly. This means you may not always find the exact same offer you saw on trivago when you land on the booking site.
translations.stays_guestselector_subheadline_pet_chec: Only show stays that allow pets
translations.stays_homepage_guestroom_selector: {GUESTS, plural, one {# Guest} other {# Guests}}, {ROOMS, plural, one {# Room} other {# Rooms}}
translations.stays_homepage_hundreds_headline: We compare hotel prices from 100s of sites
translations.stays_homepage_hundreds_subheadline: We’ll do the searching. You do the saving.
translations.stays_homepage_themes_carousel_headline: Explore dreamy stays for any kind of getaway
translations.stays_homepage_usp_compare_body: Compare hotel prices from 100s of sites at once.
translations.stays_homepage_usp_compare_body_2: Instantly compare prices from 100s of booking sites.
translations.stays_homepage_usp_save_body: Discover a great deal to book on our partner sites.
translations.stays_homepage_usp_save_body_2: Feel confident knowing you’ve found a great hotel deal.
translations.stays_homepage_usp_search_body: Search through 5 million hotels in just a few seconds.
translations.stays_homepage_usp_search_body_2: Easily search through millions of hotels in seconds.
translations.stays_hotel_class_legal_disclaimer_modal: Hotel class ratings on our site are sourced from third-party sites and reflect how the properties rate themselves, so there may be discrepancies.
translations.stays_hotel_highlights_item_card_AI_disc: This is an AI summary meant to provide a quick overview and might not be 100% accurate. Check important info with the property.
translations.stays_hotel_highlights_review_tab_AI_dis: This summary was created by AI based on the hotel description and reviews, and might not be 100% accurate.
translations.stays_idle_notification_body: Refresh your results to compare the latest hotel prices from multiple sites on trivago.
translations.stays_idle_notification_body_create_acco: Create an account to access tons more savings. It’s super easy, promise!
translations.stays_idle_notification_body_create_an_a: Create an account to unlock more savings or refresh to see the latest hotel prices.
translations.stays_idle_notification_headline_v2: Still searching for a great deal?
translations.stays_idle_notification_newsletter_subsc: Get exclusive inspiration for your next stay – subscribe to our newsletter.
translations.stays_ih_inspiration_module_headline_bea: Take a dip at these top-rated hotels
translations.stays_ih_inspiration_module_single_item_: “All of our dishes are made with seasonal ingredients bought from local growers and owners.”
“When you stay here, we hope you feel welcomed, valued and most importantly, relaxed.”
Moberly Lodge is the centerpiece to your mountain hideaway. The warm hospitality, cosy wooden lodge, and wildlife offers an authentic Rocky Mountains experience.
translations.stays_input_dates_unavailable_headline: This stay is not available for your dates
translations.stays_item_card_contact_info_tooltip: Click to see the hotel's contact info
translations.stays_item_card_reviews_tab_rating_headl: based on {countReviews} reviews from top sites
translations.stays_item_card_reviews_tri_disclaimer_b: This rating is from the trivago Rating Index (tRI), which combines guest ratings from top sites for a trustworthy result.
translations.stays_item_card_ssd_lower_than_other_pri: These are deals that are even cheaper than the lowest prices from other sites for the same property and dates on trivago. The conditions and/or room types for this deal might differ from others. Check the booking site for details.
translations.stays_item_card_standard_dates_select_da: Select dates to see exact prices
translations.stays_item_card_super_savings_badge_disc: Super Savings are deals that are even cheaper than the lowest prices from other sites for the same property and dates on trivago. The conditions and/or room types for this deal might differ from others. Check the booking site for details.
translations.stays_item_details_AI_description_discla: This summary was created by AI and might not be 100% accurate.
This AI summary is just meant to provide a quick overview. Consider checking important info with the property.
translations.stays_landing_price_calendar_headline: Discover the best time to book your next stay
translations.stays_loading_animation_comparing_deals: We’re comparing great hotel deals for you...
translations.stays_login_prompt_benefits_save_and_sor: Easily save and sort your favorite hotels for later
translations.stays_login_prompt_benefits_unlock_rewar: Unlock loyalty deals from our partner sites
translations.stays_login_prompt_homepage_benefits_pic: Easily pickup your search again from any device
translations.stays_login_prompt_homepage_benefits_unl: Save even more with loyalty deals from our partner sites
translations.stays_login_prompt_homepage_subtitle_tri: Create an account to save time and money on your next hotel. It’s super easy, promise.
translations.stays_login_prompt_subtitle_trivago_crea: Create an account to access tons more savings. It’s super easy, promise!
translations.stays_low_intent_calendar_message_subhea: Select a check-in and check-out date
translations.stays_low_intent_headline_see_prices_fro: See prices from {ADVERTISERS, plural, =0 {# sites} one {# site} two {# sites} few {# sites} many {# sites} other {# sites}}
translations.stays_loyalty_deal_badge_tooltip: You’re seeing loyalty deals because you’re logged in to trivago. Join our partner site’s loyalty program to book this deal.
translations.stays_mapview_30_min_tooltip: Show me what's within a 30-minute drive from this popular site
translations.stays_metasearch_loading_animation_copy_: Comparing hotel prices from multiple sites...
translations.stays_price_alerts_activation_allow_noti: We couldn't turn on price alerts for {itemName}. Please allow notifications on your browser settings.
translations.stays_price_alerts_activation_message: We will notify you if prices drop 10% or more.
translations.stays_price_alerts_activation_turned_off: Price alerts for {itemName} are turned off
translations.stays_price_alerts_activation_turned_on: Price alerts for {itemName} are turned on
translations.stays_price_comparison_show_other_prices: Show other prices from {ADVERTISERS, plural, =0 {# booking sites} one {# booking site} two {# booking sites} few {# booking sites} many {# booking sites} other {# booking sites}}
translations.stays_price_drop_tooltip_disclaimer: The price for this stay is {value}% lower than the cheapest price found up to 7 days ago. The conditions and/or room types for this deal might differ from others. Check the booking site for details.
translations.stays_push_notifications_destination_pri: We’ll send you an alert if prices drop 10% or more
Turn on price alerts for your destination
Save money on your trip to {cityName}
translations.stays_recently_viewed_body: Explore stays and we’ll save them here so you can easily continue your search later.
translations.stays_results_list_alternative_results_l: Similar stays that match some of your criteria
translations.stays_results_list_limited_stays_remove_: Try removing some filters to see more stays.
translations.stays_reviews_legal_disclaimer_modal: We source guest reviews from third-party sites or the property directly. While we do our best to provide you with accurate and reliable information, we cannot guarantee that reviews come from verified guests.
translations.stays_reward_rates_banner_result_list_v1: Log in to trivago to see special rates, rewards and perks from our partners.
translations.stays_rooms_tab_disclaimer: Room details are provided by Expedia.
translations.stays_rooms_tab_no_room_info_body: To see room prices, go to the Prices tab.
translations.stays_slideout_share_whatsapp_link_messa: Hey! Check out this great stay I found on trivago: {sharingLink}
translations.stays_standard_dates_unavailable_headlin: Select dates to see prices and availability
translations.stays_travel_advice_calendar_disclaimer_: Prices are based on the average price range for 3-star hotels per night.
translations.stays_travel_advice_calendar_empty_state: Try exploring some of our other destinations while we gather the latest prices for you.
Looks like our price data is hiding
translations.stays_welcome_headline_with_name: Ready to find a great hotel deal, {userName}?
translations.stays_welcome_headline_without_name: Ready to find a great hotel deal?
translations.superhost_explanation: Superhosts are Airbnb's experienced hosts who are committed to providing great stays for guests.
translations.technical_problems_no_prices: Oops! We seem to be having some trouble getting your hotel prices. Don't worry, our engineers are on it.
translations.thanks_for_subscribing: Thanks for subscribing to the trivago newsletter. We have sent you an email to confirm your registration. If you do not see it in your inbox, please also check your spam folder. Happy hotel hunting!
translations.time_out_core: It is taking too long to retrieve your location. Please retry or type in a destination.
translations.tri_based_on_no_partners: based on {iBasedOn} reviews across the web
translations.try_again_some_minutes_later: Treat yourself to a coffee and try again in a couple of minutes.
translations.unavailable_price_trend: No price trend data at this time
translations.very_popular_tooltip: Popularity is determined by the total number of guest reviews of this accommodation compared to all others of the same type and star class in {city}
